articles.description: Shapeshifting concepts from Motorola and Samsung likely won't turn into real products for quite some time.
articles.content: Imagine if your phone or tablet could change the size of its screen depending on what you're doing? That's the future Motorola and Samsung envision, as both companies showcased concept devices capabl… [+7811 chars]
